main_figures.name: exclamation_rate_bootstrap_ci.png
main_figures.reason: 統計的有意性あり (p=0.0272)、文化差を明確に示す
main_figures.caption: Exclamation rate across countries with 95% Bootstrap CI. Japan shows significantly lower exclamation usage (Welch's ANOVA: F=7.443, p=0.0272).

main_figures.name: emoji_rate_bootstrap_ci.png
main_figures.reason: 最大の効果量 (d=8.765)、スペインと日本の対比
main_figures.caption: Emoji rate comparison showing Spain's expressive style vs Japan's restrained approach (Cohen's d=8.765, Large effect).

main_figures.name: multi_metric_comparison_football_only.png
main_figures.reason: 5軸すべてを1枚で比較、論文のFigure 1候補
main_figures.caption: Comprehensive five-axis comparison of watching styles across four countries (Football-only dataset). Shows emotional expression, engagement, and textual patterns.

main_figures.name: mean_cpm_bootstrap_ci.png
main_figures.reason: エンゲージメントの基本指標、スポーツ交絡除去後
main_figures.caption: Comments Per Minute (CPM) across countries after removing sport confounding. Shows consistent engagement in football-only analysis.

main_figures.name: cultural_profiles_heatmap_football_only.png
main_figures.reason: 文化プロファイルの可視化、クラスタリング
main_figures.caption: Cultural profile heatmap showing hierarchical clustering. Spain and UK form a cluster, distinct from Japan.

main_figures.name: exclamation_rate_effect_sizes_heatmap.png
main_figures.reason: 全ペアの効果量を一覧、日本-UK間でLarge効果
main_figures.caption: Pairwise effect sizes (Cohen's d) for exclamation rate. Japan-UK pair shows large effect (d=-4.183).

main_figures.name: laugh_rate_bootstrap_ci.png
main_figures.reason: 笑い表現の文化差、日本の「w」文化
main_figures.caption: Laugh expression rate (w, lol, haha) showing Japan's unique "w" culture with high usage.

supplementary_figures.name: sport_confounding_cpm_comparison.png
supplementary_figures.reason: スポーツ交絡の明確な証拠、Methods説明に必須
supplementary_figures.caption: Sport confounding effect on CPM. Baseball streams show 2× higher engagement than football, necessitating football-only analysis.

supplementary_figures.name: sport_confounding_summary_table.png
supplementary_figures.reason: 交絡の包括的サマリー、透明性の証明
supplementary_figures.caption: Comprehensive summary of sport confounding effects. Cultural metrics remain stable while engagement metrics vary by sport type.

supplementary_figures.name: mean_length_bootstrap_ci.png
supplementary_figures.reason: コメント長の違い、UK/Spain vs Japan
supplementary_figures.caption: Mean comment length showing Western countries' longer comments vs Japan's brevity.

supplementary_figures.name: mean_burst_intensity_bootstrap_ci.png
supplementary_figures.reason: バースト強度、エンゲージメントの質
supplementary_figures.caption: Burst intensity showing peak engagement moments. Spain shows highest intensity during critical match events.
